idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

descript.abstract: Points representing flat scatters and sites, from all Kazanluk seasons during 2009-2011, final dataset for analysis and visualisation, accompanies the KAZ_ObjectSummary and Site Catalogue.TRAP numbers should be used as the cross-reference and main ID, all other numbers (AKB, BG_Code) are temporary and inconsistent.

citeinfo.origin: REQUIRED: The name of an organization or individual that developed the data set.
citeinfo.pubdate: REQUIRED: The date when the data set is published or otherwise made available for release.
citeinfo.title: KAZ_ScatterPoints

theme.themekt: REQUIRED: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of theme keywords.
theme.themekey: REQUIRED: Common-use word or phrase used to describe the subject of the data set.

dataIdInfo.idPurp: For publication in Oxbow, accomodating the publication text, approved by Julia; reduced a bit from the original ScatterPoints
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
This dataset features a point for each flat 'site' from all Kazanluk seasons during 2009-2011, in multi-centric 'sites' only a single point has been retained, where concentraions are up to 200m apart.

This is final dataset for Oxbow publication analysis and visualisation, accompanies the KAZ_SiteTableOxbow and Site CatalogueOxbow.

TRAP numbers should be used as the cross-reference and main ID, all other numbers (AKB, BG_Code) are temporary and inconsistent.

Some additional TRAP numbers appear (e.g. 4152) as mergers between preexisting site components; two instances of 1006 (for the two disinct components) have been unified, 4114 component of 4115 has been also eliminated, etc.

searchKeys.keyword: Scatterpoints from 2009-2011 (5 seasons); final dataset for publication; NEWEST

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.
cntorgp.cntorg: REQUIRED: The organization responsible for the metadata information.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

dataqual.logic: All sites indicating human surface activity or residence; offsite scatters filtered out, only the most meaningful ones left in
dataqual.complete: As complete as can be at the moment
